
#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    int i,j,x,y;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int count=0;
        scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
        if(y%x==0)
           printf("%d\n",y/x);
           else
            {
                while(y>0)
                {
                    y=y-x;
                    count+=1;
                }
            printf("%d\n",count);
            }

    }
    return 0;
}
